content.question: Which of the following is a correct expression for the kinetic energy of the block as it first travels through position <math alttext="x equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction k x sub 0 squared over 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>k</mi><msubsup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msubsup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction k x sub 0 squared over 2, end fraction, minus mu m g x sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>k</mi><msubsup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msubsup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>μ</mi><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><msub><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction k x sub 0 squared over 2, end fraction, minus the fraction 3 mu m g x sub 0 over 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>k</mi><msubsup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msubsup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>μ</mi><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><msub><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction k x sub 0 squared over 2, end fraction, minus 2 mu m g x sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>k</mi><msubsup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msubsup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>μ</mi><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><msub><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction k x sub 0 squared over 2, end fraction, minus mu m g x sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>k</mi><msubsup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msubsup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>μ</mi><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><msub><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
